ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] reincarnation time
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I think your necro can easily get all the lambent pieces for your bard.  I think lambent is some of the best non-planar stuff you can get, so you re
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I think your necro can easily get all the lambent pieces for your
bard. I think lambent is some of the best non-planar stuff you can get, so
you're always good going for that.

If you're looking for something a little different, there's always a Mith
BP, should be easy enough, and shin guantlets from Lower guk usually just
rot, so most wouldn't mind your bard going there and picking them up
(they're no-drop, I think). The arms that come off the mino Patriarch are
good... If you hunt in Karnor's, you might be able to pick him up some
singing steel boots.

I'd say do the Lambent quests, they're usually better AC and stats than the
other things you can get, but if you don't want to quest, there are still
lots of other options.

Bien

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [SMTP:thierry.cyr@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 17, 2000 12:24 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] reincarnation time
>
> hiya, just killing time at work so i figured i'd ask this question. First
> off let me state that my main character is a necro, lev 52 and that my
> bard
> lev 36 has been on the shelf for over 6 months. I dunno about all of you
> but
> i find 50+ levels to be extremely depressing, i feel like im taking one
> step
> forward 2 steps back. I find that in general all classes become extremely
> powerfull over 50 but its brain numbing repetition. I been playing my
> little
> warrior (almost 14 with 400hp weeee). Its kinda cool to play a warrior, i
> did 2 crippling blows in a row for 96 dmg to a kodiak at lev 12, i was in
> shock.
>
> But anyways, the reason im writing this is because im thinking of
> restarting
> my bard, but he's nekked (i stripped him when i started my necro). You
> have
> anything that you could suggest to re-equip with that is easy to obtain
> with
> my big boy necro? i need armor and weapons. He's got lambent arms or
> bracer
> still, and shin pants and gloves and his mask still, and i think he has a
> barbute too, not sure. I was thinkin of goin to guk to get a carapace
> maybe
> for a bp till i get him something better. Any suggestions of something i
> can
> solo easily with my necro to give to him? and weapons.... all i have is a
> fs long sword hehe (if only my wakizashies on my ranger were not no drop).
> maybe i could go terrorize the avatar of fear or something, but im hoping
> to
> avoid the claw. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated as i think
> its
> time to take the dust off that old drummer boy. I think i'd like to go to
> hate one day with that bard
>
> Your opinions/suggestions will not be taken lightly and will be greatly
> appreciated
>
> -Rakka 52 Dark elf Heretic
> -Minkin 36 wood-elf Bard
> -Tanqueray 14 half-elf warrior
>
> "Nothing in the world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not;
> nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not;
> unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education alone will not; the world
> is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are
> omnipotent." --Calvin Coolidge
>
